segments.text: May I have your resume , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I need a job that can give full play to my skills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like a job in a library , working with books ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like peace.As a matter of fact , I once had a job in a library .
segments.speaker: S2
